title: App Service web application
description: Recommended architectures for a web applications running in Microsoft Azure.
summary: These reference architectures show proven practices for web applications that use Azure App Service and other managed services in Azure.

series.title: Basic web application
series.summary: A basic web application that uses Azure App Service and Azure SQL Database.

series.title: Improved scalability
series.summary: Improve scalability and performance by adding cache, CDN, and WebJobs for background tasks.

series.title: Run in multiple regions
series.summary: Run a web application in multiple regions to achieve high availability.
